description: The averaged E1, E2, and Ex residual PSF ellipticity correlations must have median absolute value less than this for separations > 5 arcmin.
parameters: {'D': {'unit': 'arcmin', 'value': 5.0, 'label': None, 'description': 'Separation distance'}, 'x': {'unit': '', 'value': 2, 'label': None, 'description': None}, 'bin_range_operator': {'unit': '', 'value': '>=', 'label': None, 'description': "Specifies if we're looking at correlations less than D or greater than D."}}
